sqlMap.sql: select student.id as id, person.first_name as firstName, person.last_name as lastName, person.address as address, person.city as city, person.state as state, person.zip_code as zipCode, person.type as type, student.student_id as studentId from universitySystem.student left join universitySystem.PERSON on student.id = person.type_id and person.type = "STUDENT"
sqlMap.select: left join universitySystem.STUDENT_TO_COURSE joinTable on joinTable.student_id = student.id left join universitySystem.COURSE course on joinTable.course_id = course.id where course.id = #value#
